data.name: AduAdvantages
data.value: Advantages ABU

data.name: Advantage1
data.value: High ratio of capturing a wide range of harmful substances.

data.name: Advantage10Description
data.value: Since the beginning of its operation in 1989, there has not been a single complaint regarding any of the ABUs. Our system does not have any moving or wearing parts except for a conventional water pump. Unit service life is at least 15 years.

data.name: Advantage10Title
data.value: Quality and reliability

data.name: Advantage1Description
data.value: ABU is able to capture a wide range of harmful substances with 80% to 99.9% efficiency depending on the input concentration and the physical-chemical properties of the substances.

data.name: Advantage1Title
data.value: Efficiency

data.name: Advantage2
data.value: Reliability and efficiency is proven by 25 years of experience.

data.name: Advantage2Description
data.value: Presence of solid impurities in the gas flow does not affect ABUs functional characteristics. Meanwhile other «dry» air purifying methods such as the use ion exchange filters, units with gas-discharge cells, coal or zeolites is inefficient as the resinous and suspended substances stick to the working surface.

data.name: Advantage2Title
data.value: Ability to purify ventilating air containing resinous and suspended substances

data.name: Advantage3
data.value: Economic factors.

data.name: Advantage3Description
data.value: Low operating costs due to minimal use of consumables (between 0.1 to 1.0 m<sup>3</sup>/day of water, 30-60 kg/year of biogenic additives, and 30-40 m<sup>3</sup>/h of compressed air).

data.name: Advantage3Title
data.value: Economic factors

data.name: Advantage4
data.value: Absence of chemical reagents, acids or alkalis.

data.name: Advantage4Description
data.value: ABUs are environmentally friendly, since they do not create any secondary contaminants. For example, thermal and catalyst-assisted combustion release NOx, CO and other partial oxidation by-products. Coal-based methods create contaminated condesate after superheated steam regeneration. Ozonation creates exces ozone, and chemisorption creates a saline solution on top of releasing drops of chemical regents into the atmosphere.

data.name: Advantage4Title
data.value: Environmental friendliness

data.name: Advantage5
data.value: Requires minimal maintenance.

data.name: Advantage5Description
data.value: The units are both explosion proof and flameproof. No chemical reagents, acids or alkali are used.

data.name: Advantage5Title
data.value: Safety

data.name: Advantage6
data.value: Absence of wearing or replaceable parts.

data.name: Advantage6Description
data.value: ABU operation can significantly reduce the risk of occupational diseases for employees involved in hazardous production.

data.name: Advantage6Title
data.value: Health

data.name: Advantage7
data.value: ABU service life is at least 15 years.

data.name: Advantage7Description
data.value: The units are easy to operate and do not require a permanent operator. Our specialist will provide all the necessary information and instructions during ABU installation process.

data.name: Advantage7Title
data.value: Training

data.name: Advantage8
data.value: Maintenance and monitoring

data.name: Advantage8Description1
data.value: ABU maintenance is minimal and is limited to easy to do pump repairs.

data.name: Advantage8Description2
data.value: Monitoring of the ventilating emission purification efficiency is carried out periodically, by visually observing the state of irrigation and «boiling» of the nozzle. The absorption solution is analyzed for chemical oxygen consumption once a month. If the absorbent regeneration efficiency needs to be improved, available agricultural fertilizers containing nitrogen and phosphorus are added to the solution.

data.name: Advantage8Title
data.value: Maintenance and monitoring

data.name: Advantage9
data.value: Support and technical consultations through the whole life cycle.

data.name: Advantage9Description
data.value: More than 100 ABUs are operated by 42 companies across various industries in Russia, Belarus, Ukraine and Kyrgyzstan with a lifetime of up to 25 years.

data.name: Advantage9Title
data.value: Practical use

data.name: NineReasonsToChooseAbu
data.value: 9 reasons to choose ABU:
